General.Name: Payton -L
General.Description: Payton Industries Ltd develops, produces, trades, markets, and sells transformers for communications, electronics, automotive, and industrial equipment industries in Israel, Europe, the United States, and East Asia. It offers planar and magnetic transformers, and inductors, as well as off the shelf SMT planar transformers. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Ness Ziona, Israel.

2.Name: Mr. Haim  Algamil
2.Title: VP of Operations - Payton Planar Magnetics Ltd
